For people having trouble with language, once the game is intalled, there should be a file called skidrow, open that up and change the part where it says russian to english. Worked for me. Did the install in russian though

This installs and runs perfectly on Win7 x64; install puts 2 icons on desktop: 1st one is launcher, run that & select English. Afterwards u can delete that icon and just run the game using the 2nd icon. As far as the game goes I agree with the guy who said it should be called Alan Sleep cos it's boring crap. Thanks for this one uploader and fellow seeders, I got to check it out and now I know not to waste money buying it; much appreciated. From now on I only dl shooters which give u a weapon at the start; no stupid running and dodging enemies for an hour .. so lame.

This installs and runs perfectly on Win7 x64; install puts 2 icons on desktop: Run the 1st one which is the launcher and set the language to English. Afterwards u can delete it and start the game with the 2nd icon. As far as the game goes I agree with the guy who said it should be called Alan Sleep cos it's boring crap. Hate stupid games that don't give u a weapon straight away & u have to run from and dodge enemies for an hour; this one u can't even jump over small fences to get clear .. so lame. Anyway, others might like this but for me it's going in the bitbucket. Thanks for this one uploader and fellow seeders, now I know not to waste money buying it; much appreciated.
